app.name: Book App
app.description: Welcome to our book reviews website, a place where you will discover a wide variety of literary works. Our site offers you in-depth reviews of the latest and most popular books, along with recommendations for everyone. Browse our categories, dive into the stories, and find your next favorite read. Join us on this exciting literary journey!
app.invite: By logging in or registering in the app, you can.
app.book.author: Author:
app.cookies.short: * We use our own and third-party cookies.
app.cookies: * We use our own and third-party cookies to improve your experience on our website. By continuing to browse, you accept the use of cookies.
